headerDisplay: For help and support please visit our GitHub Wiki. We hope you find this plugin useful!

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Two-letter country code which you can find here.

refreshTime.title: Refresh Timer
refreshTime.description: An interval (in seconds) in which your devices will refresh with ECOVACS. Must be 30 or more.

disableDeviceLogging.title: Disable Device Logging
disableDeviceLogging.description: If checked, device updates will not be added to the log.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If checked, more information will be added to the log.

disablePlugin.title: Disable Plugin
disablePlugin.description: If checked, the plugin will remove all accessories and not load the plugin on restart.

motionDuration.title: Alert Notification Time
motionDuration.description: The length of time (in seconds) that the motion detector will be activated if your Deebot sends a message, needs help or has low battery (if enabled below). The message is viewable in the log. Must be 1 or more.

lowBattThreshold.title: Low Battery Threshold
lowBattThreshold.description: The battery percentage at which the plugin should display a low battery status. Leave blank to match the Deebot default of 15%. Must be 1 or more.

showMotionLowBatt.title: Low Battery Motion Sensor
showMotionLowBatt.description: If checked, the motion sensor will activate when the Deebot's battery reaches the low battery threshold.

showBattHumidity.title: Show (Humidity) Battery Sensor
showBattHumidity.description: If checked, a humidity sensor showing the battery percentage will be shown.

items.title: Device ID
items.description: Device ID of the device you wish to ignore, e.g. E2000000000000000000.
